not_for_you: This interaction is not for you!
clan_command_not_in_clan: ❌ You are not in a clan to use this command.
clan_command_not_leader: ❌ Only the clan leader can use this command.
clan_command_clan_not_found: ❌ Your previous clan could not be found. Your status has been corrected.
clan_accept_no_invite: ❌ You were not invited to this clan or the invitation has expired.
clan_accept_already_in_clan: ❌ You are already in a clan. Leave your current clan to join another one.
clan_accept_welcome: ✅ Welcome! You are now a member of the **{clanName}** clan.
clan_accept_leader_notification: 🎉 {username} has accepted your invitation to the **{clanName}** clan!
clan_invite_no_bots: ❌ You cannot invite bots to a clan.
clan_invite_not_in_clan: ❌ You are not in a clan to invite someone.
clan_invite_not_leader: ❌ Only the clan leader can invite new members.
clan_invite_sent: ✅ Invitation sent to **{username}** to join the **{clanName}** clan.
clan_invite_dm_notification: ⚔️ You have been invited by **{username}** to join the **{clanName}** clan!
clan_invite_dm_instructions: Use the command `/clan_aceitar nome_do_cla:{clanName}` to accept.
clan_invite_dm_fail: ⚠️ Could not notify {username} via DM, but the invitation is active.
clan_create_already_in_clan: ❌ You are already part of a clan.
clan_create_name_exists: ❌ A clan with this name already exists.
clan_create_tag_exists: ❌ A clan with this tag already exists.
clan_create_success: 🎉 Congratulations! The **{clanName}** [{clanTag}] clan has been successfully founded!
clan_create_invalid_color: ❌ The color must be in a valid HEX format (e.g., #FF0000).
clan_create_inappropriate_name: ❌ The clan name or tag contains inappropriate words. Please choose another.
clan_create_category_not_found: ⚠️ The private channels category was not found. The clan was created without a channel.
clan_create_error_generic: An unexpected error occurred while creating the clan. The transaction was reverted.
clan_channel_welcome: ⚔️ Welcome to the private channel for the **{clanName}** clan! Only members can see this.
clan_create_requirements_not_met: ❌ You do not meet the requirements to create a clan. You must be an active participant in raids.
clan_kick_self: ❌ You cannot kick yourself. If you want to leave, use `/cla_sair`.
clan_kick_not_in_clan: ❌ You are not in a clan.
clan_kick_not_leader: ❌ Only the clan leader can kick members.
clan_kick_not_a_member: ❌ {username} is not a member of your clan.
clan_kick_success: ✅ **{username}** has been kicked from the clan.
clan_kick_dm_notification: You have been kicked from the **{clanName}** clan by the leader.
clan_info_not_in_clan: ❌ You are not in a clan. Specify a clan name to see its information.
clan_leave_not_in_clan: ❌ You are not in a clan.
clan_leave_clan_disbanded: ❌ The clan you were in no longer seems to exist. Your status has been corrected.
clan_leave_leader_cannot_leave: ❌ The leader cannot leave the clan. You must dissolve the clan or transfer leadership.
clan_summon_no_channel: ❌ Your clan does not have a private channel to send announcements to.
clan_summon_success: ✅ Announcement sent to your clan channel <#{channelId}>.
clan_summon_error: ❌ An error occurred while trying to send the announcement.
clan_disband_success: ✅ The clan **{clanName}** has been successfully disbanded.
clan_disband_error: ❌ An error occurred while trying to disband the clan.
clan_disband_dm: The clan **{clanName}** has been disbanded by the leader.
raid_channel_not_found: I couldn't find the channel to announce the raid. Please notify an administrator!
raid_embed_description:
I'd like some help to beat the **__Raid__ __level {nivel}__** on **__${dificuldade}__** difficulty.

__I'd be grateful!__
raid_reply_success: I sent it to the Hunters, go check it out <#{channelId}> 😏
raid_reply_error: I couldn't send the announcement in the raids channel. Check my permissions!
ai_error: Sorry, an error occurred while trying to respond.
raid_original_message_not_found: Could not find the original raid announcement message.
raid_leader_cannot_leave: The leader cannot leave their own raid, only close it.
raid_already_in: You are already in this raid!
raid_thread_welcome:
Welcome, <@{userId}>! This is the thread to organize your raid.

**Raid Controls:**
Use the button below to access your controls.
kick_no_one_to_kick: There are no members to kick.
kick_who_to_kick: Who would you like to kick?
raid_closed_by_leader: The leader has closed the Raid. {members}
raid_thanks_for_coming: Thank you all for your interest.
vc_raid_data_not_found: Could not find this raid's data to activate voice chat.
vc_raid_not_active: This raid no longer seems to be active.
vc_opt_in_enabled: 🔊 You have enabled automatic entry into the voice chat when the raid starts.
vc_opt_in_disabled: 🔇 You have disabled automatic entry into the voice chat.
raid_started_by_leader: Attention team! The raid has been started by the leader!
level_up_notification: 🎉 Congratulations! You have leveled up to level {level}!
level_up_notification_public: 🎉 Congratulations, <@{userId}>! You have leveled up to level {level}!
raid_thanks_to_helpers: Thank you to everyone who helped: {helpers}. You are amazing people!
raid_started_vc_created: The raid has started and a voice chat has been created!
kick_only_leader: Only the raid leader can perform this action.
kick_raid_not_found: Could not find the raid or its associated thread.
kick_success_leader_msg: {username} was kicked from the raid by the leader.
kick_dm_notification: Sorry 🥺💔! {leaderName}, the raid leader, had other plans. Good luck next time 🙌!
